--- Generated by wuhaijun
--- File name : battle_fsm_revive.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2021/04/14
--- Description : 复活
---

local helper = battle_helper
local table_names = tables

---@type battle_components
local battle_components = require(helper.path.battle_components)
---@type fsm_battle_base
local super = require(helper.path.battle_fsm .. 'fsm/fsm_battle_base')

---@class battle_fsm_revive : fsm_battle_base
local battle_fsm_revive = class("battle_fsm_revive", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
---@param context context
function battle_fsm_revive:ctor(context)
    super.ctor(self, table_names.BTLState.ids.BTLState_Revive, context)
end

---进入状态
---@protected
---@param entity entity
function battle_fsm_revive:enter_state(entity)
    entity:replace_component(battle_components.unit_active, true)
    entity:replace_component(battle_components.unit_action, table_names.RoleRes.properties.ReviveAction, true, 0, self.animation_finished_callback)
end

---卸载
---@public
function battle_fsm_revive:dispose()
    super.dispose(self)
end

return battle_fsm_revive
